tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: This prof teaches a masters level course at University of Waterloo. Stay away from her. She is the worst, in terms of her teaching, availability out of class. She is not receptive to any suggestion. She will play around with your marks, and cannot lecture. She doesn\'t take up the audit case in class properly, and will just ramble on about herself.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GET READY TO READ  TEST HEAVY
comments: She expects you to know materials and be able to get tested on it before she even teaches it. She also goes off topic a lot and that can lose your focus. She has her favourites as well. Anyway, I don\'t recommend her. Sylvia was a better prof as she always stayed on topic (although sometimes hard to understand) and her exams were fair.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: She is a very kind professor and will try her best to help you achieve her goals however, cannot lecture for the life of her. She was very unclear when she\'s teaching and even skips important lessons when she\'s behind. Speaking with her one on one was okay but overall, she could have been better.

comments: She\'s a tough grader, expects you to be quite succint and detailed at the same time when it comes to the exams and her lectures are long and boring.
